name: Tiiny Ragdoll Sandbox
description:
Active Ragdoll Physics Sandbox Fun!
Welcome to Tiiny Sandbox
Introducing the new Tiiny Universe!
Tiiny Sandbox gives you a chance to test the new ragdoll and physics systems running the new Tiiny Universe.
It's completely open for you to play about in the world, and will be used in my other Tiiny games like Tiiny Knights and Tiiny Openworld.
Main Features:
Always active Ragdoll physics
Interactive Physics-based Contraptions
Basketball hoops, Bowling, Explosions
Spawn objects and explosives at will
Play with low gravity to see how it affects everything
This is a tech demo for a series of games
Try it and see what you think!
Be sure to check out my stuff on YouTube!
https://www.youtube.com/user/nimsony
